price: Sivyo hivyo! Lau mngeli jua kwa ujuzi wa yakini,
footnotes: Ama kwa hakika lau mngeli jua kwa yakini uovu wa mwisho wenu bila ya shaka mngeli ogopa huko kushindania kurindika mali, na mngeli jitengenezea Akhera yenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
